HomePage.title: Title Seeker
HomePage.subTitle: Flexibility, speed, and simplicity will allow you to find the desired title at any time and place!
HomePage.description: There are times when you want to watch a good movie, especially when you are not in the mood or when you have already watched everything you wanted, but instead of watching it, you spend a lot of time searching for the desired movie in hundreds of lists and compilations, and as a result - you do not watch anything.
HomePage.solution: This platform was created to solve this problem!

keys.first: Movie search with many filters that will help narrow down the list as much as possible.
keys.second: The ability to rate movies and form your own movie lists, have statistics and much more (only for registered users).
keys.third: The mobile version of the site will allow you to do almost everything that is available on the desktop with maximum adaptability and speed.
